quote: You don't understand the power of loss when it first hits you like a baseball coming fast from an out-of-control pitcher....It's the third day after an injury when the pain really starts to throb.
quote_letters: YOU DONT UNDERSTAND THE POWER OF LOSS WHEN IT FIRST HITS YOU LIKE A BASEBALL COMING FAST FROM AN OUT-OF-CONTROL PITCHERITS THE THIRD DAY AFTER AN INJURY WHEN THE PAIN REALLY STARTS TO THROB
